document_data.caption: The islands of Yadd al-Djinni in the Djinni's Claws.
document_data.name: Yadd al-Djinni
document_data.mainbody: '''Yadd al-Djinni''', or the '''Hand of the Djinni''', were rocky jungle islands of the [[Djinni's Claws]] southwest of mainland [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: The islands of Yadd al-Djinni were very slender and covered with dense jungle.
document_data.Inhabitants: Civilized people stayed far away from these islands since they were inhabited by a variety of monsters and [[undead]], including the rare [[su-monster]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Some speculated that the undead that could be found on this island were offshoots of the undead that inhabited the island of [[Kaff]].
